5 Additional Analyses 5.1 Reduced Model 5.2 Removed Outlier (Forced Entry) 5.3 Removed Outlier (Reduced Model) 5.4 Robust Regression 5.5 Effect Sizes 5.6 Comparing Model Fit (AIC) 5.7 Best Subset of models 5.8 Moderation TBC

The \(R^2\) increased by 24.6% in model 2. The model with Trait Anger accounts for an additional 1823.60 Sum of Squares controlling for demographics and alcohol/substance use and this too was statistically significant (p < .01). The \(R^2\) increased by 14.6%. 5.2.3 Model Summaries Model 1 ## ## Call: ## lm(formula = DDDI_Total ~ age + sex, data = ma.nout[ma.nout$include == ## TRUE, ]) ## ## Residuals: ## Min 1Q Median 3Q Max ## -23.160 -8.576 -1.528 10.840 16.748 ## ## Coefficients: ## Estimate Std.
